applicant-details.application-details-intro: Enter the details of the person whose details you want to update. Their details must match the identity document that UK Visas and Immigration holds on record.

identity-number.identity-number-intro: For security, you must provide us with information from an identity document that UK Visas and Immigration has on your client’s record.

dependant-details.header: Which dependant would you like to make the same changes to?

check-answers.check-answers-intro: Check these details carefully before continuing. If any of the details are incorrect, change them.

dependants.label: Which dependant(s) would you like to make the same changes to?
